creditline:
The William M. Ladd Collection
Gift of Herschel V. Jones, 1916
dimension:
6 15/16 x 4 15/16 in. (17.62 x 12.54 cm) (plate, and trimmed sheet)
18 x 14 in. (45.72 x 35.56 cm) (mat, Size I)
inscription:
LL verso, in pencil: [Whistler - \"Chapel Doorway, Montesor\" Sup. 341 K.395 only state]
Center verso at bottom of sheet, in pencil: [73]
LR verso, in penci: [K 395]; cursive in pencil: [Renaissance Doorway]
markings: LC printed in the image: [(butterfly symbol)]
signed: LL recto, in pencil: sheet trimmed leaving a tab for Whistler\'s butterfly monogram and [imp.]
title: Chapel Doorway, Montresor
